title: Rounded Corners/Bubble Font
content:
Hi all,

I guess this ID is pretty simple for the most of you. I downloaded this font weeks or months ago somewhere on the net , but somehow I can't remember the URL/foundry anymore. I already searched on [Maniacker's](http://web.archive.org/web/20101209155421/http:/www2.wind.ne.jp/maniackers/designfont.html) and [Bureau Destruct's](http://web.archive.org/web/20101209155421/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/www.burodestruct.net) site (which came first into my mind when I saw this font) but didn't have any luck with it. Argh...

Any ideas?  
Many thanks in advance!
